Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: grrrama
Reviews.Content: I've used a Nikon Coolpix for years now.  When they get old, I get the same, only a newer model.  This one seems to be just as good, or better.  I really like the zoom feature, much easier to use, for me.  Shipping was great, the whole transactions was!

Reviews.Title: My mistake
Reviews.Author: S. Carroll "Traveler"
Reviews.Content: Sorry, my mistake.  I purchased the XP50, which is waterproof, not the L25.  I havent figured out how to get the original (wrong) review off..
